Barnes City, IA 50027

citations.narrative:
A building providing sheltered housing to 27 dogs has enclosure walls made of concrete blocks that are not sealed to
make them impervious to moisture. For 18 dogs, including Rottweilers and Cavalier King Charles Spaniels, unsealed
concrete block makes up the interior sidewalls and back wall of the enclosures. Enclosures housing 9 dogs, mostly
Yorkshire Terriers, have a back wall that is unsealed concrete block. The licensee has purchased the sealer, but has not
been able to apply it yet.
Enclosure walls made of materials that are porous (not impervious to moisture) can not be adequately cleaned and
sanitized and could harbor viruses or bacteria that can cause illness in dogs.
All walls and other surfaces in contact with animals must be imperious to moisture.
To be corrected by: February 7, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.3(e)(1)(iii) 
   
Sheltered housing facilities. 
A building providing sheltered housing to 27 dogs has enclosure walls made of concrete blocks that are not sealed to 
make them impervious to moisture. For 18 dogs, including Rottweilers and Cavalier King Charles Spaniels, unsealed 
concrete block makes up the interior sidewalls and back wall of the enclosures. Enclosures housing 9 dogs, mostly 
Yorkshire Terriers, have a back wall that is unsealed concrete block. The licensee has purchased the sealer, but has not 
been able to apply it yet. 
Enclosure walls made of materials that are porous (not impervious to moisture) can not be adequately cleaned and 
sanitized and could harbor viruses or bacteria that can cause illness in dogs. 
All walls and other surfaces in contact with animals must be imperious to moisture. 
To be corrected by: February 7, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
